name: Janni's Jaunt
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Planes of Power © 2016, Paizo Inc.
text:
This spell functions as per plane shift, but with the following exceptions.

First, you are able to transport only willing creatures.

Second, the spell can transport you and any other willing targets only to an Elemental Planes, the Astral Plane, or the Material Plane.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材(一根能与位面旅行谐调的分岔金属棒)
target_zh: 最多八名自愿生物一起
text_zh: 此法术效果如同异界传送(plane shift)，除了以下差异。首先，你只能和自愿的生物一起传送。其次，此法术能传送你和其他自愿生物到元素位面(Elemental Plane)、灵界(Astral Plane)或是物质位面(Material Plane)。
